ValueDomain.preferredName: OMOP CDM Marital or Partnership Status
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A demographic parameter indicating a person's current conjugal status. (NCIt)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that a couple has informally separated.

Concepts.definition: An indication that a couple has informally separated.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that a female, married individual who is or was living with another person left their shared home.

Concepts.definition: An indication that a female, married individual who is or was living with another person left their shared home.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that a married individual who is or was living with another person left their shared home.

Concepts.definition: An indication that a married individual who is or was living with another person left their shared home.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An unmarried, older woman, beyond the usual age for marriage.

Concepts.definition: An unmarried, older woman, beyond the usual age for marriage.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual is separated from the person with whom they were sharing a home.

Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual is separated from the person with whom they were sharing a home.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual has married, after already having been married at least once.

Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual has married, after already having been married at least once.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual is intentionally not married and abstains from engaging in sexual activities.

Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual is intentionally not married and abstains from engaging in sexual activities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual has recently married.

Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual has recently married.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual is or was married to single individual at a given time.

Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual is or was married to single individual at a given time.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Marital or Civil Status Not Disclosed

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Marital or Civil Status Not Disclosed
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that the marital or civil status of a relationship has not been disclosed.

Concepts.longName: Marital or Civil Status Not Disclosed
Concepts.definition: An indication that the marital or civil status of a relationship has not been disclosed.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that a male, married individual who is or was living with another person left their shared home.

Concepts.definition: An indication that a male, married individual who is or was living with another person left their shared home.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces sperm. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, cultural gender role distinctions, or both.: A sexual attraction to members of the same sex.: The social institution involving legal and/or religious sanction whereby men and women are joined together for the purpose of founding a family unit; the state of being a married couple.

Concepts.definition: A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces sperm. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, cultural gender role distinctions, or both.
A sexual attraction to members of the same sex.
The social institution involving legal and/or religious sanction whereby men and women are joined together for the purpose of founding a family unit; the state of being a married couple.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces ova. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, or cultural gender role distinctions, or both.: A sexual attraction to members of the same sex.: The social institution involving legal and/or religious sanction whereby men and women are joined together for the purpose of founding a family unit; the state of being a married couple.

Concepts.definition: A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces ova. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, or cultural gender role distinctions, or both.
A sexual attraction to members of the same sex.
The social institution involving legal and/or religious sanction whereby men and women are joined together for the purpose of founding a family unit; the state of being a married couple.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A sexual attraction to members of the same sex.: The social institution involving legal and/or religious sanction whereby men and women are joined together for the purpose of founding a family unit; the state of being a married couple.

Concepts.definition: A sexual attraction to members of the same sex.
The social institution involving legal and/or religious sanction whereby men and women are joined together for the purpose of founding a family unit; the state of being a married couple.

PermissibleValues.value: Divorced/person whose civil partnership has been dissolved

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates that a civil partnership has been legally dissolved.

Concepts.definition: Indicates that a civil partnership has been legally dissolved.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A legal status where individuals are living in a continuous, conjugal relationship for a period of time defined by law.

Concepts.definition: A legal status where individuals are living in a continuous, conjugal relationship for a period of time defined by law.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Living together as if married, usually without legal or religious sanction.

Concepts.definition: Living together as if married, usually without legal or religious sanction.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual who is or was living with another person left their shared home.

Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual who is or was living with another person left their shared home.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The ending of a social partnership.

Concepts.definition: The ending of a social partnership.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A formal agreement or promise to marry that is ended before the marriage takes place.

Concepts.definition: A formal agreement or promise to marry that is ended before the marriage takes place.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A man who is not, and has never been, married.

Concepts.definition: A man who is not, and has never been, married.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A demographic parameter indicating a person's current conjugal status.: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: A demographic parameter indicating a person's current conjugal status.
Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A man who has lost his spouse by death and has not remarried.

Concepts.definition: A man who has lost his spouse by death and has not remarried.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An individual who has lost their spouse by death, has not remarried, and who has legal rights related to the estate of the deceased spouse.

Concepts.definition: An individual who has lost their spouse by death, has not remarried, and who has legal rights related to the estate of the deceased spouse.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A woman who has lost her spouse by death and has not remarried.

Concepts.definition: A woman who has lost her spouse by death and has not remarried.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.: A human being.

Concepts.definition: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.
A human being.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.: Indicates a person who has never been married or whose marriages have been annulled.

Concepts.definition: Not accompanied by another or others; exclusive of anyone or anything else.
Indicates a person who has never been married or whose marriages have been annulled.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: In a formal agreement for marriage.

Concepts.definition: In a formal agreement for marriage.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Married in secret, especially without parental consent.

Concepts.definition: Married in secret, especially without parental consent.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: To meet the requirements under law; not in violation of law or anything related to the law.: Indicates a person currently joined in a legally binding matrimonial union.  Classify common law marriage as married.  Includes married couples living together and not living together.

Concepts.definition: To meet the requirements under law; not in violation of law or anything related to the law.
Indicates a person currently joined in a legally binding matrimonial union.  Classify common law marriage as married.  Includes married couples living together and not living together.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Marriage contract has been declared null and to not have existed. (HL7)

Concepts.definition: A marital status in which a voidable marriage is legally declared null and void, as though it never existed. Specific grounds for annullment vary within the presiding jurisdiction, whether geographic or religious.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Temporary order issued during the course of litigation. (HL7)

Concepts.definition: The condition existing when an order or judgement is considered temporary until either a specified period of time has passed or specific information is provided to assist in rendering a permanent decision.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates a person whose marriage has been legally dissolved and has not remarried.

Concepts.definition: Indicates a person whose marriage has been legally dissolved and has not remarried.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates a person who is a member of an unmarried couple, including same sex couples, living together in longstanding relationships, that are registered or unregistered.

Concepts.definition: Indicates a person who is a member of an unmarried couple, including same sex couples, living together in longstanding relationships, that are registered or unregistered.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates a person living apart from his/her spouse by legal arrangement.

Concepts.definition: Indicates a person living apart from his/her spouse by legal arrangement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates a person currently joined in a legally binding matrimonial union.  Classify common law marriage as married.  Includes married couples living together and not living together.

Concepts.definition: Indicates a person currently joined in a legally binding matrimonial union.  Classify common law marriage as married.  Includes married couples living together and not living together.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A type of living arrangement or mating system in which at least one member of a relationship has more than one mate.

Concepts.definition: A type of living arrangement or mating system in which at least one member of a relationship has more than one mate.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates a person who is no longer married because of the death of his/her spouse and has not remarried.

Concepts.definition: Indicates a person who is no longer married because of the death of his/her spouse and has not remarried.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.
